Muzaffar has a place to keep the calves, and sufficient fodder. However, he does not have enough start-up capital to purchase three calves. Muzaffar really needs this loan.

loans.use: to purchase three calves in order to start his own business

loans.name: Vu

texts.en:
Vu would like to take a further loan to buy more spare parts to sell from his shop. 

Vu's previous loan enabled him to increase his sales and earn a higher income to support his family. He hopes that another loan will assist him in increasing the size of his business, attract new customers, and increase sales. 

He also hopes that through the loan, he can increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy many kinds of motorcycle parts to sell.

loans.name: Xuan

texts.en:
Xuan would like to take a further loan to buy more construction products to sell from her shop. 

Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. 

She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers, and increase sales. 

She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of products for building, such as paint and bathroom items.

loans.name: Senovia

texts.en:
Senovia lives with her long-term partner and their three children in the city of San Pedro de Macoris. She has run her fruits and vegetables stall in front of her house for over four years, having started it with her own capital. Her latest loan was invested in the business. 

This is Senovia's fifth loan, which she will use to finish building her house. Many years ago, Senovia started building her house, and with her business profits, she has been able to build her house little by little. Now Senovia wants to invest this loan to buy construction materials such as cement, concrete blocks, rods, and other building materials. She has a wood structure home and she will build a safer structure with concrete blocks and cement. 

Esperanza Internacional runs a program for their good clients who are reliable in repaying their loans, who have fulfilled the commitment to grow their business, and who have shown fidelity in their groups. This allows them to take out a loan to improve the structure of their house at the same time as running their businesses and attending their group meetings. 

Senovia thanks God, Esperanza Internacional and all of you for this opportunity. In her name and that of her family, thanks to you for your support!

loans.use: To buy concrete blocks, cement, rods, sand, etc.

loans.name: Toribio

texts.es:
El sr. Toribio tiene 53 años, se dedica en la fabricación y ventas de calzados con su esposa. Gracias al trabajo que están  haciendo pueden mantenerse, y cubrir los gastos que día a día surgen.
El señor  ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable y honesta con sus compromisos. Solicita este crédito para la compra de plantillas para calzados que lo trae de Argentina. Agradece por la  oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que le será de mucha utilidad.
texts.en: Toribio, age 53, works in production and sales of shoes with his wife. Thanks to the work they are doing  they can get by, and cover the expenses that arise day by day. Toribio has proven to be a very responsible person and honest with his obligations. He requests this loan to buy insoles for shoes that he brings from Argentina. He appreciates the opportunity that he is receiving, which is already very useful.

loans.use: to buy insoles for shoes.

loans.name: Kuña Rory Group

texts.es:
Kuña Rory es un grupo que viene trabajando arduamente queriendo ayudarse las unas a las otras y dar a su familia todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder conocer la situación de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra.Waltraud, quien realiza vende  leche, queso y productos agrícolas, además de que realiza decoraciones,  se debe destacar el gran esfuerzo que ella hace por poder salir adelante, ya que así es la única forma de poder seguir ayudando a su familia y crecer.
La Sra. Waltraud  solicita de este crédito para la compra de  insumos para surtir su negocio, como ser leche y quesos, para poder venderlos y seguir luchando por crecer.
texts.en:
Kuña Rory is a group of women who work hard: they want to help each other and to provide their families with all the things they themselves couldn't have. They are doing the poverty elimination survey, so that they can understand the individual situations of each member of the group. 

One of the members is Waltraud, who sells milk, cheese, and agricultural products, as well as doing decorating. It is important to emphasize the huge effort she puts into moving forward, since this is the only way she can keep growing and keep helping her family. 

Waltraud requests this loan to buy supplies such as milk and cheese to stock her business, so she can sell them and continue fighting to grow.

loans.use: to buy cheese and milk to sell.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer 2 Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de la ciudad de Encarnación está integrado por 15 mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras, que con mucho esfuerzo están saliendo adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, y quieren ir mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Mariam, ella es modista y tiene un taller de costuras en su casa , su principal trabajo es hacer trajes para los carnavales y también para las escuelas de danza de la zona , ella sigue muy entusiasmada invirtiendo el dinero del préstamo que realiza dentro del comité, lo que le ayuda a invertir en su taller y a seguir mejorando sus ingresos y el de su familia 
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas para seguir con sus confecciones, y así poder mejorar su emprendimiento.
texts.en:
This group from the city of Encarnación consists of 15 very hardworking, driven women who are getting ahead by means of much effort.  They are taking the poverty elimination survey and want to improve their poverty situation.

One of the members is Miriam.  She’s a seamstress and has her sewing workshop at home.  Her main work is making costumes for carnival and for local dance schools.  She continues very excited investing the money from the loan she’s gotten in the committee in her workshop to continue improving her and her family’s income.

She’s requesting the loan to buy fabric to continue with her dressmaking to improve her business this way.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Mujeres Capaces Group

texts.es:
Este grupo está en su ciclo número 5, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde gracias al trabajo están mejorando su situación de pobreza, y quieren seguir trabajando para ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Una persona digna de destacar es la Sra. Braulia, quien se dedica a la venta de bocaditos, comenta que ofrece sus servicios para distintos eventos, y es así como está saliendo adelante y ayudando a su familia. Es una persona muy emprendedora, que con mucho esfuerzo está saliendo adelante y lucha por mejorar.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de verduras, condimentos, carne, huevo, harina y demás, con lo que podrá seguir trabajando y luchando. Agradece por esta oportunidad que su grupo esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
This group is in cycle #5.  They are all taking the poverty elimination survey.  Thanks to their work they are improving their poverty situation and want to continue working to help their loved ones.

One of the people worthy of note is Braulia who sells snacks.  She comments that she offers her services at various events and this is how she’s getting ahead and helping her family.  She’s a very enterprising woman who with much effort is getting ahead and striving to improve.

She requests this loan to buy vegetables, condiments, meat, eggs, flour and others to continue working and striving.  She’s grateful for this opportunity her group is getting.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, meat, eggs, flour, etc.

loans.name: Sheku

texts.en:
This is 38-year-old Sheku.  He is married and has one child, aged six months.

In 2010, Sheku established his business, selling clothing and shoes. He began his business, because his salary was very small and not enough to take care of the home. Working 7 days a week and 15 hours a day, he earns about SLL 350,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. Sheku requires a loan in order to buy more stock, i.e. clothes and shoes, for resale. In the future, Sheku plans to build a house. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more stock, i.e. clothes and shoes, for resale.

loans.name: Hanh

texts.en:
Hanh is a 35-year-old, married woman. She lives with her two children and husband, in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money as a welder in a  factory. For 11 years, Hanh has run a general store selling confectionery, and plastic and metal household items, to people in her community.

Hanh would like a loan, to purchase better-quality confectionery, and plastic and metal household items, for her store. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. She also hopes that, through her loan, she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties that may face her family.

loans.use: to buy confectionery, and plastic and metal household items, to stock her store

loans.name: Que Dieu Nous Benisse Group

texts.en: Augustine is one of the members of the group Que Dieu Nous Benisse (1). The group consists of 11 micro-entrepreneurs from Brazzaville, Congo. Augustine is a single mother of three children whose ages range from 29 to 36 years old. She is very excited to be receiving her second loan from HOPE Congo after having successfully paid off her previous loan. She has had her business for around 18 years. Her business consists of selling second-hand clothing. She says her biggest challenge so far in her business has been the seasonality of supply from vendors, which causes drastic changes in prices. With this next loan, she will be able to buy in bulk, which will allow her to get through those tough times of low supply without having to pay the extra high prices. Augustine has big dreams for the future and hopes that one day she will be able to travel abroad to study business. She thanks you all for your support!!!

loans.use: to buy many second-hand clothes in bulk

loans.name: Zuvaidullo

texts.ru: Зувайдулло образованный, трудолюбивый и предприимчивый человек. Ему 41 год. Он женат на Зулфии и у них четверо сыновей и одна дочь. Все дети ходят в школу. Зувайдулло имеет высшее педагогическое образование. Он работает учителем в местной школе. Параллельно Зувайдулло занимается животноводством. Он успешно совмещает свою работу с бизнесом. Ему конечно же помогает семья. Зувайдулло выращивает крупнорогатый скот около 10 лет. Сейчас он обратился за кредитом, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота. На сумму кредита Зувайдулло планирует купить двух бычков для дальнейшего откорма и продажи. Зувайдулло целеустремленный человек. Он думает о расширении бизнеса и хочет в ближайшем будущем начать еще и выращивание овец.
texts.en:
Zuvaidullo is an educated, hardworking and enterprising man. He is 41 years old. He is married to Zulfii and they have four sons and one daughter. All the children go to school. Zuvaidullo has higher pedagogical education. He works as a teacher at the local school. In parallel, Zuvaidullo works with cattle breeding. He has successfully combined his work with his business. His wife of course helps him with the cattle. 

Zuvaidullo has bred cattle for around 10 years. Currently he applies for a loan in order to increase the number of cattle. For the loan amount, Zuvaidullo plans to purchase two bulls for fattening and subsequently sell. Zuvaidullo is a purposeful man. He thinks about expanding his business and would like to start an additional one, breeding sheep, in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase two bulls to feed and subsequently resell

loans.name: Progreso Y Conciliacion 1 Group

texts.en:
Eludina (the older one) is one of Esperanza International's entrepreneurs. She came to Esperanza International almost seven years ago for a loan to expand her business. She joined the group Progreso y Conciliacion  1.1, in one of the rural villages in San Pedro de Macoris, where she has received 14 loans to invest in her business.

Esperanza International is running a program where most of their clients pay back their loans, fulfill the commitment to expand their businesses and show fidelity in their groups. They can request loans to improve their homes while running their businesses and attending groups meetings.

Eludina is living in a rural town with her three children. She is a widow and mother. She started building her house with the family savings and with the help of this loan, she will finish building her roof, covering her home walls with cement and painting them while the other member, Maritza, will build her home in parts. First, she is taking this loan to buy concrete blocks, cements, rods and other building materials to build 50% of her home structure from wood to concrete blocks. She will change her old zinc roof. Both members request a housing loan for their home improvement. Eludina and Maritza thank you all for your support!!!

loans.use: To buy cement, concrete blocks, zinc, etc.

loans.name: Que Dieu Nous Benisse Group

texts.en: Basile is one of the members of the group Que Dieu Nous Benisse (2). The group consists of 11 microentrepreneurs from Brazzaville, Congo. Basile is married with nine children whose ages range from 22 to 36 years old. Basile is very excited to be receiving his second loan from HOPE Congo after having successfully paid off his previous loan. He has had his business for around five years. His business is a general store, selling many different items including drinks, flour, sugar, and other food items. He says his biggest challenge so far is the inconsistency of his suppliers. Often, when he goes to restock his store, the supplier does not have any inventory available for sale. With this next loan, he will be able to buy more of each of these items to further grow his inventory. By buying in bulk, he will be able to continue to work through those periods when his supplier is out of inventory. Basile hopes to continue to grow and diversify his store in the future. With future profits, he dreams of one day building his own home. He also wants to teach his children the business so they can one day have a business of their own. He thanks you all for your support!!!

loans.use: to buy cartons of milk and large sacks of sugar

loans.name: Célestine's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de trois personnes, qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Célestine (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 53 ans. Célestine n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Célestine est divorcée avec trois enfants, dont certains scolarisés et deux à sa charge. Célestine vit seule avec enfants. Les diverses charges de la famille sont assumées par Célestine. Pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille, dame Célestine vend depuis quarante ans des œufs et du maïs à son domicile. Célestine s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. En vue de renforcer son activité Célestine s’associe aux autres membres de son groupe pour solliciter un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: This group consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, named Célestine (the one whose hand is raised) is 53 years old. Célestine did not attend school. Célestine is divorced with three children, some of whom are students and two are dependents. Célestine lives alone with her children. Various family expenses are paid by Célestine. To support her family, she has been selling eggs and corn at home for 40 years. Célestine gets her supplies in a market at Benin. In order to strengthen her business, Célestine is joining other members of her group to seek a loan from Alidé.

loans.use: to buy eggs and corn

loans.name: Virgencita De Caacuoe Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgencita de Caacupé está en su ciclo número 5to. del programa comité de mujeres, donde casi todas tienen actividades productivas y donde todas se ayudan para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas están esforzándose por salir adelante.
Emilia es peluquera, y cuenta que por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia, tiene los ingresos que necesita para salir adelante y les da todo lo que necesitan. Ella es una persona que se está esforzando por ser una mejor emprendedora y es por eso que participa activamente de las capacitaciones.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de tintes, shampoo, enjuagues, cremas y demás, y así seguir luchando por mejorar su servicio que ofrece a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group called “Virgencita de Caacupé” is in cycle #5 in the women’s committee program.  Almost all of them carry out productive activities and they all help each other get ahead.  They are taking the poverty elimination survey and all of them are striving to get ahead.

Emilia’s a barber and she relates that she helps her family by means of her work.  She earns income enough to get ahead and to give them everything they need.  She’s a person who is striving to be a better entrepreneur and this is why she actively takes part in the training sessions.

She’s asking for this loan to buy hair color, shampoo, rinse, cream and others to continue striving to improve the service she offers her customers.

loans.use: to buy dye, shampoo, rinses, creams, etc.

loans.name: Mouintaga

texts.fr:
Âgé de 28 ans, MOUINTAGA  a 2 épouses et est père de 2 enfants. Il est domicilié  avec sa famille dans la ville de Koutiala (Région de Sikasso). 
MOUINTAGA mène des activités de commerce général notamment l’achat vente de divers articles depuis 10 ans. Cette activité lui procure assez de revenus, sa demande est souvent très grande, car il reçoit beaucoup de clients par jour. Pour la bonne satisfaction de sa clientèle et l’agrandissement de son activité, MOUINTAGA a fait recours à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso.  Il est à son  1er prêt    individuel. Ce prêt sera  utilisé pour l’acquisition des stocks de  diverses marchandises ( thé, sucre, savon, céréales, lait, biscuits, insecticides et des pâtes alimentaires. Il s’approvisionne auprès  des grossistes de Bamako et effectue sa vente dans sa boutique à Koutiala à une clientèle mixte. MOUINTAGA compte réaliser un  bénéfice mensuel de 100.000 FCFA  qu’il utilisera pour le remboursement des d’intérêts de Soro Yiriwaso, satisfaire aux besoins de sa famille et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Mouintaga is 28 years old, has two wives and is the father of two children. He lives with his family in the city of Koutiala (Sikasso region).

For the past ten years he has been busy with general commerce in particular the trading of various items. This activity gives him enough income, demand is often quite high, because he gets a lot of customers every day.

To ensure good customer satisfaction and to expand his business, Mouintaga made ​​use of the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution. This is his first individual loan. 

This loan will be used to purchase stocks of various goods (tea, sugar, soap, cereal, milk, biscuits, insecticides and pasta). He resupplies with wholesalers in Bamako and sales are made in his shop in Koutiala to a mixed clientele.

Mouintaga expects to achieve a monthly profit of 100,000 CFA francs he will use to repay Soro Yiriwaso interests, meet the needs of his family and invest the rest in his activity.

loans.use: buy various grocery items

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo Nueva Esperanza  está en su ciclo número 1º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo dentro del grupo.
La Sra. Tecla es una de las integrantes, quien se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo y solicita  este crédito para la compra de remeras, camisas, jeans y demás,  que le ayudará  a concretar más su negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
Es una persona muy trabajadora que con esfuerzo esta saliendo adelante.
texts.en:
The “Nueva Esperanza” (New Hope) group is in cycle #1 in the women’s committee program.  They all work and help each other out in order to get ahead by means of effort and continuous teamwork in the group.

Tecla is one of the members.  She sells all types of articles of clothing and is asking for this loan to buy t-shirts, shirts, jeans and others that will help her solidify the business more and help her improve her income.  She’s a very hardworking woman who is getting ahead by means of her effort.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Jumelle Group

texts.fr:
Les cinq  membres du groupe JUMELLE  sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 36 ans, et ont en moyenne  3 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des  familles monogamiques à  SANOUBOUGOU I un des quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso 3ème  région administrative du Mali. 
Elles sont à leur 7ème  prêt avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle.
Mme    Aminata fait le commerce de boisons dans ce groupe de femmes. Elle se tien debout au milieu.
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt environ 15 casiers de boisson sucrée qu’elle revend en détail sur place et au marché. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 35 000 francs cfa dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son interêt et l’autre pour son épargne.
texts.en:
The five members of the JUMELLE group are married women who average 36 years old with 3 children. Most of them are in monogamous marriages and live in Sanoubougou I, one of the low-income neighborhoods of the city of Sikasso, in the 3rd administrative region of Mali. 

This is their 7th loan with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso, with the goal of satisfying their clients’ needs.

In this group of women, Aminata is the one who sells beverages. She is standing in the middle of the photo. 

She plans on using her loan to buy 15 cases of sweetened beverages that she retails locally and at the market. 

She hopes to earn an average monthly income of 35,000 CFA Francs, which will be used to pay off her loan with interest, with the remainder going into her savings.

loans.use: to buy beverages.

loans.name: Leafa

texts.en:
Leafa is a 51-year-old married woman with six children.
 
She has a small plantation and grows taro and samoa cocoa beans to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. Leafa has requested a loan to buy a weed sprayer, wheelbarrow, spade, pickaxe and chemicals for her business. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2008. With her profits, Leafa hopes to extend her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, wheelbarrow, spade, pickaxe and chemicals

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
El Sr. Luis tiene 43 años de edad está casado con la Sra. Elvira, con quien tiene un hijo, quien es la inspiración de ambos de seguir trabajando y luchando para darle lo que ellos no tuvieron.
Se dedica a la plantación de tomate, locote, tabaco, poroto entre otro desde hace varios años, esta actividad la realiza con su hijo.
El crédito solicitado lo quiere invertir en la compra de media sombra para su plantación, para poder proteger su cultivo y producir una buena calidad en sus productos y de esa manera aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Luis, 43, is married to Elvira with whom he has a son who is their source of encouragement to continue working and striving to be able to give him everything they themselves never had.

He’s been growing tomatoes, bell peppers, tobacco and beans, among others  for several years, an activity he does with his son.

The requested loan will be used to buy shading for his plants to protect them and produce good quality products to increase his income and improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy shading to protect the crops.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gsutavo es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, se dedica a la agricultura y por medio de esto ayuda a su familia. Quiere seguir trabajando y luchando para poder dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan, el comenta que su anterior crédito lo utilizo en la compra de un motor para el sistema de riego de su cultivo, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda.
hoy pide de nuevo un crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de semillas para poder seguir con sus cultivos, y así seguir trabajando. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Gustavo’s a very hardworking, driven man who works in agriculture and supports his family this way.  He wants to continue working and striving to be able to give his family everything they need.  He comments that he used his previous loan to buy a motor for his irrigation system which was of great help.

Today, he’s asking for a new loan to buy seeds to continue with his crops and thus continue working.  He’s grateful for this new opportunity he’s getting.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Shahzoda

texts.ru: Милая женщина на фотографии это Шахзода. Ей 46 лет. Она мать двоих детей и верная жена. Ее муж находится на заработках заграницей. Сын тоже за пределами страны. Она живет в городе Душанбе с дочерью. Ее дочь учится в университете. Шахзода домохозяйка и большую часть времени она проводит дома одна. Поэтому Шахзода решила не сидеть без дел и открыть возле дома продуктовый магазин. Она построила маленькое помещение, только осталось провести внутренний ремонт в помещение и закупить пищевые продукты. На ремонт и на товары у нее не хватает средств. Шахзода верит, что ее подержат и она найдет применение своему свободному времени, а также будет приносить свой вклад в бюджет семьи.
texts.en: The pretty woman in the photo is Shahzoda. She is 46 years old. She is the mother of two children and a faithful wife. Her husband is working abroad. Her son is also out of the country. She lives in the city of Dushanbe with her daughter. Her daughter is studying at the university. Shahzoda is a housewife and most her time she spends alone at home. Therefore, Shahzoda decided not to just sit around, and she opened a grocery store near her house. She built a small room, and the only thing left is to finish the interior and to buy food. She doesn't have enough money to make repairs and buy goods. Shahzoda believes that people will patronize her shop, and it will not only give her something to do, but will also allow her to contribute to the family budget.

loans.use: to finish building a store and buying food.

loans.name: Olga

texts.ru: Ольга - предприниматель. Она продает детскую и подростковую одежду - носки, колготы, колготки, лосины, нижнее белье. Для своего бизнеса Ольга арендует часть бутика на городском крытытом рынке. Ольга имеет определенные приемущества пред конкурентами - достаточный опыт торговли, доступный ходовой товар, постоянных клиентов, доступные цены. Ольга запланировала поездку на оптовый рынок за зимним товаром. Она просит предоставить ей кредит в размере 15,000 гривен для закупки товара. Ольга замужем, дети уже взрослые, планирует и дальше развивать свой бизнес как основной источник дохода для ее семьи.
texts.en: Olga is the entrepreneur. She sells clothing for children and teens--socks, tights, stockings, leggings, underwear. Olga leases part of a boutique in the city market. Olga has certain advantages over competitors: experience in trading, a broad inventory, repeat customers, and affordable prices. Olga is planning a trip to the wholesale market to buy winter merchandise. She is asking for a loan of 15,000 hryvnia to purchase goods. Olga is married. Her children are grown, and she is planning to further develop her business as a major source of income for her family.

loans.use: to increase her winter inventory

loans.name: La Candelaria Group

texts.es:
El comité La Candelaria está en el 3er. ciclo con dieciséis integrantes, ellas son mujeres de una ciudad muy lejana de la zona céntrica, eminentemente agrícola. Están luchando por mejorar la zona misma en la que viven.
Una de las integrantes la señora Irma, quien se dedica a la cría de animales como gallinas y chanchos, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de balanceados y animales y los vende a sus vecinos, ella quiere seguir trabajando de manera a tener su propio negocio familiar, trabajando con su marido e hijos y por ende lograr el bienestar de ellos que manifiesta es su razón de vivir.
texts.en:
The “La Candelaria” (Candlemas) committee is in its third cycle with 16 members.  They are women from a city that’s very far from the central zone and that’s mostly agricultural.  They are striving to improve the zone they live in.

One of the members is Irma who raises animals like chickens and pigs.  The loan she’s asking for is to buy nutritionally balanced feed and animals to sell to her neighbors.  She wants to continue working in order to have her own family business working with her husband and children for their mutual well-being.  She states, by the way, that they are her reason for being.

loans.use: to buy animals and animal feed.

loans.name: Alice

texts.pt:
Alice é comerciante, casada e tem 2 filhos com 12 e 8 anos de idade destes  apenas 1 está a estudar o outro não por estar doente. Ela não sustenta mais ninguém além dos filhos e vive na casa própria.
Com o valor irá comprar refrescos, cervejas, recargas, vinho para reforçar  o seu negócio que faz na sua casa.
Para o futuro quer crescer no negócio, comprar mais bens para a sua casa.
Diz que compromete se a pagar pontualmente e voltar a solicitar mais para realizar todos os seus planos.
texts.en:
Alice is a trader. She's married and has two children aged 12 and 8 years, only one of whom studies - the other child doesn't study due to illness. She doesn't support anyone else other than her children and lives in a house that she owns.
With the amount of the loan she'll purchase refreshments, beer, cell phone credits and wine so that she can boost the business she runs in her home.
In the future she wishes to make her business grow and acquire more goods for her house.
She states that she pledges to repay the loan in a timely fashion and request more loans again so she can accomplish all her plans.

loans.use: to purchase refreshments, beer, cell phone credits and wine.

loans.name: Loua

texts.en:
Loua is 34 years old and married, with five children. She runs a small business selling ice cake in her community, and she has been doing this for two years.

Loua has requested a loan to buy cordials, sugar, coolers, Chinese lollies, and foam cups. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. 

With her earnings, Loua will provide for her family's daily needs.

loans.use: to buy cordials, sugar, coolers, Chinese lollies, and foam cups

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru: Людмила торгует на Центральном рынке спортивной одеждой.  Торговое место собственное, опыт работы 20 лет. За время работы у Людмилы были и спады, и подъемы в бизнесе. Она преодолевала все трудности своим трудолюбием и напористостью. Благодаря своему бизнесу Людмила постоянно улучшает быт своей семьи - жилищные условия, качественное питание, пр. Людмила просит предоставить ей кредит в размере 10,000 гривен на закупку сезонного товара.
texts.en: Ludmila sells sportswear at the Central Market. She has her own shop and twenty years of experience. Ludmila has had ups and downs with her business. She has overcome all of these difficulties with work ethic and grit. Because of the business, Ludmila been able to constantly improve her family life--housing, decent food, etc. Ludmila is asking for a loan of 10,000 hryvnia to purchase seasonal merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase inventory for winter.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru: Светлана - предприниматель, она торгует халатами и пижамами. Товар продается хорошо, часто берут на подарок. У Светланы большой опыт торговли, широкий ассотримент и доступные цены. Она знает, что главное - это клиент и его предпочтения, поэтому Светлана всегда старается иметь большой ассортимент, чтобы клиент мог выбрать и купить товар у нее. Светлана просит предоставить ей кредит в размере 5,000 гривен на закупку товара и увеличение ассортимента.
texts.en: Svetlana is an entrepreneur. She sells bathrobes and pajamas. These products sell well. People often buy them as gifts. Svetlana has broad experience in sales, a wide assortment of products, and affordable prices. She knows that the main thing is the customer and his preferences, so Svetlana always tries to have a variety of products the client can choose and buy. Svetlana is asking for a loan of 5,000 hryvnia to buy goods and increase her inventory.

loans.use: purchase additional inventory.

loans.name: San Arnoldo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Arnoldo está en el cuarto ciclo programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de  Curuguaty, la cual es una zona no muy alejada de la zona céntrica y se encuentra en crecimiento, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. María es parte de este grupo, ella tiene una despensa bien surtida, que con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo pudo montar. Comenta que al principio le costó un poco, pero después poco a poco se fue afianzando y mejorando, y hoy ya tiene muy buena clientela. 
Solicitó de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su despensa, como ser verduras, bebidas, carne, artículos de limpieza y demás. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de crecer y mejorar.
texts.en:
The group called “San Arnoldo” is in its 4th cycle in the women’s committee program.  It’s from the city of Curuguaty which is in a zone that’s not too far from the central zone and that’s in a growing phase which is why the members of this group want to strive to grow and to give the area they live in a better environment so that they can grow slowly.

María is part of this group.  She has a well-stocked grocery store that she was able to set up with much effort.  She comments that it was difficult at first but later on it gradually took root and improved; today her clientele is very good.

She requested this loan to buy stock like vegetables, beverages, meat, cleaning supplies, etc. for her store.  She’s grateful for this growth and improvement opportunity she’s receiving.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Peniamina

texts.en:
Peniamina is 23 years old, not married and has no children. She has a small garden where she grows cabbages, tomatoes, eggplant and cucumbers that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 2 years. Peniamina needs a loan to buy weed killer, gloves, a garden hose, a rake and a wheelbarrow.

She has been a member of SPBD since 2008. Peniamina will use the profits from her sales to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy weed killer, gloves, a garden hose, a rake and a wheelbarrow

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
La Sra. Patricia, es dueña de un negocio familiar que lo administra junto con su marido el Sr. David, su negocio es la venta de celulares de todo tipo, accesorios en general, recargas, giros, también realizan reparaciones.
Cuentan que hace más de 10 años aproximadamente que trabajan en su negocio, y es gracias a eso que están saliendo adelante. Tienen experiencia en el rubro, clientela ya formada. Ella es una persona muy emprendedora, tiene excelentes referencias a nivel comercial como en el sistema financiero.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de repuestos, recargas y accesorios en general para poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Patricia owns a family business that she runs with her husband, David.   The business is sales of all types of mobile phones, accessories in general, chargers, money orders and they also do repairs.

They relate that they’ve been in business for about ten years and thanks to it they are getting ahead.  They have experience in the line of work and an established clientele.  

She’s a very enterprising person with excellent commercial and financial references .  She’s requesting this loan to buy spare parts, recharges and accessories in general to be able to stay in business.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone accessories and equipment.

loans.name: Mario

texts.pt:
Mário é casado e vive na casa de sua māe,  tem 22 anos de idade é pai 1 filho com 5 anos ainda menor por isso nāo estuda,  além deste sustenta sua māe e sobrinho que vivem com ele. 
Com o valor do crédito ira comprar cimento, chapas de zinco, pranchas, barrotes, para dar continuidade a sua obra de 3 quartos, 2 salas e 2 varandas.
Para o futuro diz que quer voltar a estudar apartir do próximo ano, terminar a sua obra que faz num espaço cedido pela sua māe ao lado da casa dela.
Diz que ira pagar pontualmente o emprestimo e que voltara a solicitar mais para concretizar o seu projecto.
texts.en:
Mário is married and lives in his mother's house. He's 22 years old and has a 5-year-old son who's still too young and therefore doesn't study. Aside from his son, he supports his mother and his nephew who live with him.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase cement, metal sheets, planks and beams so he can continue building three bedrooms, two living rooms and two porches.
He states that in the future he wishes to go back to school starting next year. He also wishes to finish the construction work that he's been doing on a space provided by his mother which is next door to her house.
He states that he'll repay the loan in a timely fashion and that he'll apply for more loans again so he can achieve his project.

loans.use: to purchase cement, metal sheets, planks and beams.

loans.name: Adelaide

texts.pt:
Adelaide é técnica administrativa numa empresa do ramo agricola tem 51 anos e 7 filhos dos quais 1 estudante do nivel secundário e 6 sāo maiores de idade vive na casa propria.
Com o valor irá comprar cimento , janelas e  portas para dar continuidade a sua obra de construçāo de dependências para arendar.
Seu plano para o futuro é terminar a construçāo de dependências para reforçar a renda familiar e comprar uma camioneta para alugar para  carregamento de mercadoria .
Diz que irá pagar pontualmente e voltar a solicitar mais créditos como forma de concretizar o seu plano.
texts.en:
Adelaide is an administrative assistant for an agricultural company. She's 51 years old and has seven children, one of whom is a high school student and six of them are adults. She lives in a house that she owns.
With this amount she'll purchase cement, windows and doors so she can continue building rooms for renting out.
Her plan for the future is to finish building the rooms so she can boost her family's income. She also plans to buy a truck in order to rent it for merchandise transportation.
She states that she'll repay the loan in a timely fashion and apply for more loans again as a way of achieving her plan.

loans.use: to purchase cement, windows and doors.

loans.name: Cerafin

texts.es:
Don Cerafín tiene 43 años, está acompañado hace más de 10 años  y vive en la ciudad de Carapeguá.   
El señor Cerafín desde muy joven trabajo en la fabricación y venta de artesanía, luego se  casó con la hija de una tejedora y  empezaron a trabajar juntos, Hoy en día y como hace más de 20  años que se dedica a  la venta de las tradicionales  sobrecamas y hamacas, los cuales lleva a vender por la zona de Asunción y Chaco con una  clientela bien  formada. También se tiene una pequeña despensa en su casa donde atiende su esposa.  Gracias a este trabajo y al esfuerzo de los dos  pudo construir una linda casa con las comodidades necesarias. 
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de sobrecamas, hamacas, sabanas  y otros que en ésta temporada lo solicitan mucho sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cerafín, 43, has been in a relationship for more than ten years and lives in the city of Carapeguá.  He’s been a craftsman since he was very young.  He later married a weaver’s daughter and they started to work together.  

Today and for the last twenty years he’s been selling traditional bedspreads and hammocks in Asunción and Chaco to a well-established clientele.  He also has a small grocery store at home his wife manages.  Thanks to this work and to their joint effort he was able to build a lovely house with all necessary comforts.

He’s asking for the loan to buy bedspreads, hammocks, sheets and others that are in customer demand this season.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads, hammocks, sheets and others.

loans.name: Khudoyshukur

texts.ru: Сорока шестилетний Худойшукур проживает с женой и детьми в районе Дж.Руми. Его основным занятием является земледелие. Он на своей участке орошаемой земли сеит сельскохозяйственные культуры. К тому же у него дома имеется одна дойная корова, которая обеспечивает его семью молоком. В данный момент Худойшукур хочет параллельно заняться овцеводством. Он собирается выращивать овец и барашек для дальнейшей продажи. Худойшукур решил начать бизнес с малого количества и по мере достижения опыта и успеха он будет увеличивать поголовье овец. На деньги от кредита он хочет закупить четыре барашек и овец. У него созданы все условия для ведения этой деятельности. Худойшукур будет счастлив если Вы ему поможете!
texts.en: Forty-six-year Khudoyshukur lives with his wife and children in J.Rumy. He is a farmer. He grows irrigated crops on his plot of land. In addition, he has a dairy cow at home that provides milk for his family. Currently Khudoyshukur wants to raise sheep as well. He's going to raise sheep and lambs to sell. Khudoyshukur decided to start a business with a small amount of money. With experience and luck, he will increase the number of sheep he owns. He wants to buy four lamb and sheep with the loan. He has everything ready. Khudoyshukur will be happy if you help him!

loans.use: to buy four lambs and a sheep.

loans.name: Badeya Group

texts.fr:
Constitué exclusivement de 4 femmes dont 3 mariées, les membres de groupe Badeya vivent majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 40 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème  Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de mariage. 
Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce, d’encens, de bois de chauffe et de pagnes wax-bazins. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré  Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 14ème  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame ASTAN  assise  en deuxième position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo fait la vente de pagne wax et Bazin. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 5 pièces de pagnes wax et 2 pièces de pagnes bazins. 
Elle s’approvisionne auprès des grossistes et effectue ses  ventes en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à domicile et au marché, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 25 000 francs cfa dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son interêt et l’autre pour son épargne .
texts.en:
Made up of 4 women, 3 of whom are married, the members of the Badeya group live mostly in traditional families, and average 40 years old with 4 children. They all live in the city of Sikasso (3rd administrative region of Mali) and met through family ties, friends and marriage. 

The group members sell incense, firewood, wax cloth and damask fabric. 

They joined Soro Yiriwaso with the goal of increasing their capital, and are now on their 14th group loan.

Astan (seated second from the left in the photo) sells wax cloth and damask fabric. She will use the loan to purchase 5 lengths of wax cloth and 2 lengths of damask.

She gets her supplies from wholesalers, and sells them to male and female retail clients, for cash or credit, both out of her home and at the market. 

She plans on earning an average monthly income of 25,000 CFA Francs, which will go towards repaying her loan with interest and increasing her savings.

loans.use: to buy wax cloth and damask fabric.

loans.name: José

texts.pt:
José, casado, pai de 03 (três) filhos, dos quais somente 02 (dois) é que vão a escola e vive na casa própria. Para além da sua família sustenta também a sua mãe que vive com ele. 
É agente da lei e ordem por período indeterminado.
Com o presente empréstimo de 17.000,00mt pretende adquirir pedra, areia fina e grossa, varrões de ferro, chapas de zinco a fim de iniciar com as obras da sua casa.
Tem como sonhos construir um salão cabeleireiro, uma minimercearia, ter uma moradia condigna e aumentar o seu nível académico. Tem como principal desafio dar continuidade com os estudos.
texts.en:
José is married and has three children, oly two of whom attend school. He lives in a house that he owns. Aside from his family he also supports his mother who lives with him.
He's a law enforcement officer under an open-ended contract.
With the current loan for 17,000mt he intends to purchase rocks, fine and coarse sand, iron rods and metal sheets so he can start building his house.
His dreams are to open a hair salon and a small grocery store, own a decent home and further his education level. His main challenge is moving forward with his studies.

loans.use: to purchase rocks, fine and coarse sand, iron rods and metal sheets so he can start building his house.

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en:
Juvy is 41 years old and married with three children.

Juvy works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a  25,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more stock of sugar, soap, soy sauce, and other groceries.

Juvy has borrowed and repaid 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 9 years and also earns an income from pig fattening and vegetable vending.

Juvy aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, soap, soy sauce, and other groceries

loans.name: Neldina

texts.en:
Neldina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a banana selling business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more bananas to sell for her banana business.

Neldina has been in this business for 3 years. Neldina earns more income from farming rice.

Neldina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell

loans.name: Hernalyn

texts.en:
As a married mother to four children, Hernalyn works hard to support her family. She sells charcoal for her business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs.  Hernalyn is borrowing 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Hernalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 52 years old and married. She works hard to help her husband.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from food vending. Rose is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional fishing nets for her business.

Rose has been sustaining her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing nets

loans.name: Vilma Del Carmen

texts.es: Vilma, tiene 41 años de edad, esta divorciada, tiene 5 hijos y vive en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de San Francisco Atlántida. Ella tiene 5 años de dedicarse a la venta de ropa nueva como blusas, camisas, pantalones, vestidos y ropa para niños, ropa intima etc. Ademas vende cosméticos, novedades, sandalias, carteras y achinería. El negocio lo tiene establecido en su casa y ya tiene su clientela fija. Vilma a decidido solicitar un segundo préstamo y es por 27,000 Lempiras para comprar más mercadería como ropa, achinería, cosméticos etc. y mantener surtido su negocio, con esta inversión ella espera obtener más utilidades ya que viene la temporada navideña. Tiene como meta trabajar duro para que crezca el negocio y que nunca les falte la alimentación y educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Vilma, 41, is divorced and has five children.  She lives in a village belonging to the municipality of San Francisco, Atlántida.  She has been selling new clothes like blouses, shirts, pants, dresses, children’s clothes, lingerie, etc. for five years.  She also sells cosmetics, novelties, sandals, purses and low-cost novelty items.  

The business is home-based and she has a regular clientele.  Vilma’s decided to request a 27,000 Lempira loan to buy more merchandise like clothes, low-cost novelty items, cosmetics, etc. to keep the shop stocked.  She hopes this investment will lead to higher profits because the Christmas season is near.  Her goal is to work hard so that business will grow and that her children never lack food or schooling.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Hedy

texts.es: Hedy, tiene 39 años de edad,  vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene nueve hijos y reside en el municipio de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  Hace 10 años se dedica al cultivo de café. El prestamo que solicito es por 3,500 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de fertilizantes y para la limpieza del cultivo de cafe. Anteriormente cultivaba maíz y frijol. Este prestamo le ayudara  a mejorar las condiciones del cultivo y asi poder obtener mejores cosechas, ya que es su única fuente de ingresos. Su objetivo es incrementar las cosechas cada año para asi obtener una mejor utilidad y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hedy, 39, is in a common law relationship with his wife and they have nine children; he lives in the town of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  He’s been a coffee grower for ten years.  

He requested a 3,500 Lempira loan to buy fertilizer and to weed the coffee plantation.  He used to grow corn and beans.

This loan will help him improve his crop’s condition to obtain greater crop yields since this is his only source of income.  His goal is to increase crop yields every year to thus earn higher profits and be able to attain better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Noralyn

texts.en:
Noralyn is 40 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 12,000 PHP loan to purchase more stock to sell like sugar, candies, snack food, canned goods, coffee and other groceries.

Noralyn has borrowed and paid back two loans from NWTF. She has been running the general store for one year and also earns an income from selling vegetables.

Noralyn aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase stock like sugar, candies, snack food, canned goods, coffee and other groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Genita

texts.en:
Genita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a banana and peanut selling business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 20,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional stock of bananas and peanuts to sell for her business.

Genita has been in this business for 6 years. Genita earns more income from raising pigs.

Genita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could send her children to school in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of bananas and peanuts to sell

loans.name: Ana Maris

texts.es: Ana, con 45 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos y cabeza de hogar, tras la separación de su esposo hace algunos años. Durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a trabajar como empleada en diferentes empresas, su último empleo fue en una empresa de telefonía móvil pero, con el fin de estar pendiente de sus hijos, decidió retirarse y montar su propio negocio, un café internet que instaló en un local donde funcionó por algún tiempo, luego tuvo que cerrarlo por cuestiones ajenas a su voluntad. Hoy en día ya compró su casa propia y desea iniciar nuevamente como independiente, por lo que desea montar nuevamente una sala de internet, ya que tiene el espacio disponible y no tendría que pagar arriendo. Esto la motiva a solicitar el crédito, pues requiere comprar computadores, mesas, sillas, impresora y, además requiere terminar unas adecuaciones en el espacio, de esta forma dará inicio a su proyecto productivo, con el que espera obtener buenos resultados  al mismo tiempo que está pendiente de las labores en su hogar. Ana es una mujer pujante, activa y emprendedora, su espíritu de superación la impulsan para salir siempre adelante, motivada por sus hijos, es por ellos que se levanta cada día para seguir luchando y darles un mejor bienestar. Ella sueña para un futuro, poner varias sucursales de café internet y al mismo tiempo alternar con una boutique de ropa y calzado, pero es consciente que para lograrlo debe trabajar arduamente, con empeño y dedicación, sólo así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de todo su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
Ana, 45, is mother of two children and head of household since separating from her husband some years ago.  During her productive life she’s been employed in a variety of firms.  Her latest job was in a mobile phone company but in order watch over her children more carefully she decided to retire from it and open her own business, an Internet café she set up in a locale where it operated for a time.  Later on she had to close it for reasons beyond her control

Now, she’s purchased her own house and wants to start again independently so wants to set up her Internet café again since she has available space and won’t have to pay rent.  This motivates her to request a loan because she needs to buy computers, tables, chairs, printers and also needs to finish doing the physical modifications to the site to start her productive project from which she hopes to get good results while at the same time being able to do her household chores.

Ana’s a driven, active, enterprising woman.  Her self-improvement spirit push her to get ahead always.  Motivated by her children she rises daily to continue to strive to give them better well-being.  She dreams in future to open several branches of her Internet café alternating it with a shoe and clothing store.  But she’s well-aware that to accomplish this she must work hard with dedication and focus for only this way will she be able to improve her immediate family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy computers, tables, chairs, printers and finish doing physical site improvements.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 34 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 50,000 PHP loan to buy items to sell like sugar, canned goods, rice, shampoo, soap, soft drinks, candies and other groceries.

Jocelyn has borrowed and paid back 26 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from fishing. Jocelyn aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like sugar, canned goods, rice, shampoo, soap, soft drinks, candies and other groceries.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a charcoal business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 11,000 PHP to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell for her business.

Teresita has been in this business for three years. She also earns additional income from a general store.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Eulivia

texts.pt:
Eulívia, casada, mãe de 4 (quatro) filhos que frequentam escola em diferentes níveis e vive na casa própria. Para além da sua família não sustenta a ninguém. 
É Assistente Técnica de profissão na Escola Primária Completa de Magude.
Com o presente empréstimo de 15.000,00mt pretende pagar propinas escolares do filho desmobilizado do Serviço Militar Obrigatório.
Tem como sonho continuar com os estudos para fazer o nível superior, melhorar as condições de habitação e financiar os estudos até nível superior. Tem como principal desafio a falta de fundos para financiar os estudos do seu esposo e dos filhos.
texts.en:
Eulívia is married and has four children who attend different levels of school. She lives in a house that she owns. Aside from her family she doesn't support anyone else.
She works as an administrative assistant for the Magude Primary School.
With the current loan for 15,000mt she intends to pay for her son's school fees since he was discharged from compulsory military service.
Her dream is to keep on studying so she can go to college, improve her living conditions and finance her studies through college. Her main challenge is the lack of funds to pay for her husband's and her children's studies.

loans.use: to pay for her son's school fees since he was discharged from compulsory military service.

loans.name: Otília

texts.pt:
Otília, casada, mãe de 3 (três) filhos que frequentam escola em diferentes níveis e vive na casa própria. Para além da sua família sustenta também a sua sobrinha que vive com ela. 
É comerciante (dedica-se a compra e venda de mantas, saias e blusas) há mais de dez anos. 
Com o presente empréstimo de 30.000,00mt pretende adquirir mais cobertores, saias e blusas para aumentar o volume de mercadorias a fim de satisfazer a demanda.
Tem como sonhos concluir a sua casa e adquirir mobílias. Tem como principal desafio a falta de fundos para investir no negócio.
texts.en:
Otília is married and has three children who attend different levels of school. She lives in a house that she owns. Aside from her family she also supports her niece who lives with her.
She has been a trader (she buys and sells blankets, skirts and blouses) for over ten years.
With the current loan for 30,000mt she intends to purchase more blankets, skirts and blouses so she can stock up on merchandise and meet the demand.
Her dreams are to finish building her house and buy furniture. Her main challenge is the lack of funds for investing in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more blankets, skirts and blouses so she can stock up on merchandise and meet the demand.

loans.name: Gladys Del Socorro

texts.es: Gladys es una campesina, nacida en una familia de agricultores y mineros, una familia humilde y trabajadora, a la que le debe todo lo que aprendió sobre las labores del campo, pues gracias a eso, hoy en día se dedica a criar ganado bovino y porcino, actividad que le brinda el sustento para su hogar. Ella se encarga de alimentar los animales, insemina a las cerdas para que den crías, atiende los partos, los vacuna y realiza todos los procedimientos que se requieren para un buen cuidado. Su ganado bovino es de doble propósito, pues los machos los vende para carne y las hembras las mantiene para sacar producción de leche, de esta manera genera todos los ingresos para solventar las necesidades básicas de su casa, donde vive con sus 3 hijos. Su empuje, disciplina, orden y el amor que le tiene a su labor, le permiten siempre encontrar nuevas alternativas para seguir avanzando, por ello, se motiva a solicitar el segundo ciclo de crédito que destinará para comprar 2 cerdas de cría, construir 2 corrales más y comprar concentrado para alimentar los animales, esto le dará la posibilidad de crecer con su negocio, pues incrementará la producción porcina para la temporada de navidad que se aproxima, donde aumenta la demanda de esta carne, así mejorará los ingresos que recibe y con los que podrá seguir avanzando hacia el cumplimiento de su sueño que es tener una granja con muchos animales, bien organizada donde toda la familia pueda trabajar, dándoles la oportunidad de mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gladys is a farmer born into a family of farmers and miners; a humble, hardworking family she owes everything she’s learned about field work to.  Thanks to this, today she works raising cattle and pigs, an activity that makes it possible for her to support her home.  She feeds the animals, inseminates the sows so they will produce offspring, cares for them during labor, vaccinates them and does all procedures needed to insure their proper care.

Her cattle serves a double purpose for she sells the males for meat and keeps the females for milk production generating income to cover all her basic household needs.  She lives with her three children.

Her drive, discipline and the love she has for her work allow her to find new alternatives always to continue making progress.  She’s motivated to seek her second loan to buy two sows to raise, to build two more corrals and to buy feed concentrate to feed the animals.  This will give her the opportunity to grow in business because pig production will increase for the upcoming Christmas season when demand of pork increases.  She will increase income earned that will help her continue making progress towards reaching her goal of having a well-organized farm with many animals that the entire family can work in giving them the opportunity to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy two sows, to build two more corrals and to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Reina

texts.es: La Sra. Reina  sigue con la actividad de la venta de frutas, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de de frutas , creció en su actividad e incremento su clientela, y por ende sus ingresos económicos, en esta ocasión solicito el crédito para la compra de frutas por mayor se siente feliz y agradecida por esta nueva oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse es cliente antigua d ela institucion tods sus credito los utilizo en el crecimiento de su negocio.
texts.en: Reina continues with the activity of selling fruits. She reports doing well with her previous loan and that she used it for buying fruit and grew her business and increased her customer base and, thus, increased her income. This time she requests credit for the purchase of wholesale fruit. She is happy and grateful for this new opportunity presented to her as this is the only activity that allows her to keep supporting herself. She is an old client of this institution and all of her loans have been used in the growth of her business.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale fruits.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.pt:
Cristina, casada, mãe de 5 (cinco) filhos que frequentam escola em diferentes níveis e vive na casa própria. Para além da sua família sustenta também cinco pessoas que vivem com ela. 
É comerciante (dedica-se a compra e venda de refrigerantes, arroz farinha de milho e outros produtos de primeira necessidade) há mais de dez anos e o seu esposo apoia na actividade comercial.
Com o presente empréstimo de 10.000,00mt pretende adquirir mais produtos (feijão, óleo de cozinha, arroz, farinha de milho e sabão) para responder a demanda reforçando o seu stock.
Tem como sonhos melhorar as condições de habitação, construir um estabelecimento comercial e financiar os estudos dos seus familiares. Tem como principal desafio a falta de fundos para investir no negócio.
texts.en:
Cristina is married and has five children who attend different levels of school. She lives in a house that she owns. Aside from her family she also supports five people who live with her.
She has been a trader (she buys and sells soft drinks, rice, cornflour and other products that are household staples) for over ten years and gets support from her husband in her business.
With the current loan for 10,000mt she intends to purchase more merchandise (beans, cooking oil, rice, cornflour and soap) so she can meet the demand by stocking up.
Her dreams are to improve her living conditions, build a store and pay for her family members' education. Her main challenge is the lack of funds for investing in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise (beans, cooking oil, rice, cornflour and soap) so she can meet the demand by stocking up.

loans.name: Fátima

texts.pt:
Fátima, casado, mãe de 6 (seis) filhos, 3 (três) que frequentam escola em diferentes níveis outros trabalham na África do Sul e vive na casa própria. Para além da sua família não sustenta a ninguém. 
É comerciante (dedica-se a compra e venda de vestuário de vestuário de 2ª mão) há mais de três anos e médica tradicional de profissão. 
Com o presente empréstimo de 10.000,00mt pretende adquirir mais fardos de roupa de crianças e adultos no sentido de aumentar o volume de mercadorias para responder a demanda.
Tem como sonhos construir um estabelecimento comercial para vender produtos alimentares e melhorar as condições de habitação. Tem como principais desafios a falta de fundos para investir nas obras e tem tido quebras nos fardos que compra.
texts.en:
Fátima is married and has six children, three of whom attend different levels of school and others work in South Africa. She lives in a house that she owns. Aside from her family, she doesn't support anyone else.
She has been a trader (she buys and sells secondhand garments) for over three years. She's also a traditional healer by trade.
With the current loan for 10,000mt she intends to purchase more bundles of clothing for children and adults in order to stock up on merchandise so she can meet the demand.
Her dreams are to build a store for selling foodstuffs and improve her living conditions. Her main challenge is the lack of funds for investing in her projects, and she's also been getting damaged clothes in the bundles that she purchases.

loans.use: to purchase more bundles of clothing for children and adults in order to stock up on merchandise so she can meet the demand.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is a hardworking entrepreneur who owns a butcher shop business in the Philippines. She is borrowing  27,000 PHP to purchase more meat to sell in her butcher shop.

Gina has been in this business for 10 years. She also earns more income from a general store. Gina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more meat to sell in her butcher shop.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy-and-sell spice business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of spice to sell for her buy-and-sell spice business.

Geraldine has been in this business for two years. She earns more income from raising pigs.

Geraldine has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of spices to sell.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
As a married mother to six children, Erlinda works hard to support her family. She owns a furniture shop business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs.  Erlinda is borrowing 10,000 PHP to buy additional wood, nails, paint, and other supplies for her furniture shop business.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities with her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional wood, nails, paint and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.pt:
Luísa, casada, mãe de 4 filhos que frequentam escola em diferentes níveis e vive na casa própria. Para além da sua família sustenta também os seus enteados que vivem com ela. 
É comerciante (dedica-se a compra e venda de carne de porco, palone, frangos congelados e worse) há mais de cinco anos. Também é assistente administrativa de profissão, a sua família apoia na actividade comercial.
Com o presente empréstimo de 10.000,00mt pretende adquirir mais produtos alimentares para responder a demanda reforçando o seu stock.
Tem como sonhos continuar com os estudos para fazer o nível superior, construir uma casa melhorada e mobiliar. Tem como principais desafios a falta de fundos para investir e de incentivos para progredir profissionalmente.
texts.en:
Luísa is married and has four children who attend different levels of school. She lives in a house that she owns. Aside from her family she also supports her stepchildren who live with her.
She has been a trader (she buys and sells pork, bologna, frozen chicken and other foodstuffs) for over five years. She's also an administrative assistant by trade. Her family supports her in her business.
With the current loan for 10,000mt she intends to purchase more foodstuffs so she can meet the demand by stocking up.
Her dreams are to continue studying so she can go to college, build a better house and furnish it. Her main challenge is the lack of funds for investing and the lack of incentive to make progress in her career.

loans.use: to purchase more foodstuffs so she can meet the demand by stocking up.

loans.name: Cherly

texts.en:
Cherly is 53 years old and married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family. Cherly runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 13,000 PHP loan to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries.

Cherly has borrowed and paid back three loans from NWTF. She has been running the general store for 29 years and also earns an income from farming rice. Cherly aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items such as shampoo and groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: María Cristina

texts.es: María es una joven campesina, emprendedora y activa, nació en una familia de agricultores y mineros y toda su vida la ha vivido en el campo. Desde que era muy niña su padre le enseñó todas las labores agropecuarias, mientras que él hacía trabajos de jornalero, ella cuidaba los animales en su casa. Es gracias a ello, que hoy en día se dedica a la cría y engorde de pollos, actividad que alterna con las labores de su hogar y con el cuidado de su familia conformada por su esposo y sus 2 pequeños hijos. A sus 25 años de edad, desea iniciar con otro proyecto productivo, con el fin de generar los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar, por ello solicita el crédito para comprar 10 cerdos para cría, adecuar el espacio para los chiqueros y comprar el concentrado para alimentar los animales, esto le permitirá poner en marcha su idea, con la que podrá seguir pendiente de su familia y alternar con el cuidado de los animales, además ve en esta actividad una buena fuente de ingresos, inicialmente porque se acerca la temporada de navidad donde es costumbre que la demanda de esta carne se aumente y por otro lado, es una carne muy económica por lo que en el resto de año las familias antioqueñas prefieren consumirla, lo que para ella sería una ventaja que se debe aprovechar. María sabe que para lograr sus objetivos con esta nueva actividad, debe trabajar de manera constante, con disciplina, empeño y mucho amor, sólo así tendrá la posibilidad de cumplir el sueño de fortalecer su negocio y brindar a sus hijos una muy buena educación, además mejorará la calidad de vida de todo su núcleo familiar.
texts.en: Maria is a young farmer who is enterprising and active. She was born into a family of farmers and miners and all her life has been spent in the country. Since she was a child, her father taught her all about agricultural work. While he was working as a day laborer, she cared for the animals at home. Thanks to this, today she makes her living breeding and raising chickens, an activity she alternates with work in the home and the care of her family which consists of her husband and 2 small children. At 25 years of age, she wishes to start another productive project in order to generate sufficient resources to support her husband with the economic burdens of the household. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to buy 10 pigs for breeding, fix up the space in the pens, and to buy food pellets to feed the animals. This will allow her to launch her idea and she will be able to keep an eye on her family while caring for the animals. Also, she sees this activity as a good source of income initially because the Christmas season approaches when it is customary that the demand for this meat will increase. On the other hand, it is a very affordable meat so during the rest of the year the families of Antioquia prefer to consume it which, for her, would be an advantage to be seized. Maria knows that to achieve her goals with this activity she should work steadily, with discipline, commitment, and love and only then will she be able to fulfill the dream of strengthening her business and give her children a good education and improve the quality of life for all her family.

loans.use: to buy 10 pigs for breeding, to fix up the space for pens, and buy pellets for animal feed.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
El Sr. Humberto tiene 55 años, tiene 3 hijos mayores y vive en pareja. Cuenta que el empezó trabajando como guarda de transporte, luego de varios años de sacrificio y dedicación logro comprar un vehículo e independizarse y trabajar como transporte escolar de varias escuelas. Gracias al trabajo que está  realizando pueden llevar una vida digna y ayudar a sus hijos.
Humberto  ha demostrado ser una persona muy sacrificada, responsable y honesta con sus compromisos. Comenta que  le da trabajo a una familia. Solicita este crédito para utilizarlo en la compra de cubiertas. Agradece por la  oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Humberto is 55 years old, has three adult children, and lives with his partner. He says that he began working as a transportation assistant, and then after several years of sacrifice and dedication he was able to buy his own vehicle, become independent, and work as a transportation provider for several schools.

Thanks to the work he does, he can live with dignity and help his children. Humberto has shown himself to be very selfless, responsible, and honest when he makes commitments, and he mentions that he employs a family. Humberto requests this loan for buying tires. He is grateful for the opportunity he is receiving, which will be of great help to him.

loans.use: to buy tires for school transport

loans.name: Alex

texts.en:
Alex, 33, is married and has 3 daughters, was born in a cottage in northern Brazil, since childhood he worked in agriculture to help his parents. He lost his mother very young and was raised by another family in the South of the country. He began to cultivate grapes in his adolescence, where he met his current wife . The two came to São Paulo in search of better job opportunities and decided to start their own businesses, now his wife has a small grocery store and he builds houses. Their biggest dream is to buy the grocery store that today is rented, to stop the work as a bricklayer, and to balance work with family. In the future he wants his family to work together in the grocery store. 

Alex wakes up very early to get the fruits and vegetables to supply his wife's grocery store and goes to work early with his teammates. He makes houses, from the foundation to the finish and paint. He will use this loan to buy building material, paints and pay his helpers.

He loves to work and go out with his family when he has spare time and money. He is evangelical and goes to church constantly. He dreams of giving a more dignified future to their three daughters, and provide them with a quality education so they can have another chance and do not need to go through everything he and his wife experienced.

loans.use: to buy building material, paints and pay his helpers

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 37 years old and has five children. Evelyn is married and has five children who are in school.

Evelyn is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Evelyn has requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Evelyn has been pig fattening for 13 years now, and has borrowed from NWTF 19 times in the past to sustain it.

In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
Emelyn is 37 years old and has five children. Emelyn is married, and four of her children are in school.

Emelyn is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Emelyn has requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional feed to sell.

Emelyn has been raising pigs for 12 years now, and has borrowed from NWTF 23 times in the past to sustain it.

In the future, Emelyn would like to save enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed to sell

loans.name: Chiessa

texts.en:
Chiessa works hard to support her family. Chiessa is married and has a business selling fermented fish in the Philippines.

Chiessa has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fish to process into fermented fish.

Chiessa has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Chiessa would like to save enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to process into fermented fish

loans.name: Dorj

texts.en:
Mr. Dorj, 38 years old, lives with his wife and children in Erdenet, the third largest city of Mongolia. The family resides in an old brick house on a plot of land. He has been working as a bookkeeper at a private firm since 2010. His wife has a position of package designer at a private firm. Their children go to high school. 

In preparation for the coming winter, he is requesting a loan of 7,000,000 MNT to buy a low pressure heater, as well some insulation materials such as fiberglass and cotton in order to renovate his house. After renovation, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and less pollutants are released into air as a result. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to install a low pressure heater and insulate the house

loans.name: Dorcas Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento DORCAS,  Está  compuesto por nueve integrantes ocho mujeres y un varón,   la presidenta del banco es la Sra. La Sra.
